p.k: Mozart: To teach Ally a lesson about quitting, Ray resumes the piano lessons with his mother that he gave up 25 years earlier
Golf: Ray's guilt about lying to Debra so that he can play golf turns into stress, for which his doctor prescribes a surprising cure
Anniversary: At Frank and Marie's anniversary party, Ray feels guilty that his parents split up for a year and only got back together after Ray fell off his bike
Working Late Again: Debra convinces Ray to give working from home a try, but things don't turn out as she had planned
The Children's Book: Ray's competitive side emerges when Debra invites him to help her write some children's books for Ally

87% A Milhouse Divided: When Milhouse's parents split up, his mum gets together with an American Gladiator called Pyro, his dad self-produces an album
87% Bart vs. Thanksgiving: After fighting with Lisa on Thanksgiving, Bart runs away from home and ends up at a homeless shelter - with a TV crew in attendance
Live: Sunday Brunch Emma Willis, Gary Kemp and actor Tchéky Karyo join Tim Lovejoy and Simon Rimmer, with music from Joy Crookes

87% Itchy & Scratchy & Marge: Marge campaigns against The Itchy & Scratchy Show after it inspires Maggie to hit Homer over the head with a hammer
